xml.brief: Mark cache as watched or ignored

desc.p: This method allows your users to mark the geocache as watched or ignored. Read the docs on separate parameters for details.

opt.name: watched
opt.p: Mark (or unmark) the cache as watched. This should be true, false or unchanged. You may access the current state of this flag with the is_watched field of the geocache method.

opt.name: ignored
opt.p: Mark (or unmark) the cache as ignored. This should be true, false or unchanged. You may access the current state of this flag with the is_ignored field of the geocache method.

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: success - true, if all went well.

returns.p: Please note, that currently this will always be true! Nothing can go wrong as long as you pass your parameters in a right way (and if you don't, you will get an HTTP 400 response). If you have received an HTTP 200 response, then you may assume that all went well.
